title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 900.1 - Purposes and objectives
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 900.1 - Purposes and objectives

State Regulations

The Youth Education, Employment and Training Program shall
provide economically disadvantaged youth 14 to 21 years of age with educational
remediation, career exploration, vocational training, counseling, support
services and work experience services designed to result in improved retention
in school, improvement in basic academic and vocational skills, acquisition of
a high school diploma or its equivalent, enrollment in continuing education or
training programs, or the attainment of enhanced employment and career
opportunities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
900.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
